## TxBuilder.addRequiredSigner() method

Adds a required signer to the transaction. This is necessary for transactions that must be explicitly signed by a particular key.

**Signature:**

```typescript
addRequiredSigner(signer: Ed25519KeyHashHex): TxBuilder;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

signer


</td><td>

Ed25519KeyHashHex


</td><td>

The hash of the Ed25519 public key that is required to sign the transaction.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[TxBuilder](./tx.txbuilder.md)

{<!-- -->TxBuilder<!-- -->} The same transaction builder
